## Data Cleaning/Wrangling

```{r}
fortnite <- clean_names(og_fortnite)
```

```{r}
fortnite <-
fortnite |> 
  select(mental_state, eliminations, accuracy, head_shots, 
         time_of_day, hits, placed)
```

```{r}
glimpse(fortnite)
```
